name: <color_light_red>Tendril Core</color>
description: Activate this core to temporarily morph your tendril into a powerful weapon.
message: Your tendril flows with immense power!

name: Core
description:
Spell casted by a mutation or trait, either passive or active. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Your blade core becomes active, providing passive effects.'

name: Arc Slash
description:
Spell casted by a mutation or trait, either passive or active. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Slashes through a wide arc, dealing cutting damage to all affected creatures.'

name: Lasher Thrust
description:
Spell casted by a mutation or trait, either passive or active. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:

name: Lush Licks
description:

name: Suck
description:
Spell casted by a mutation or trait, either passive or active. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:

description:

name: Succ - Damage
description:
Spell casted by a mutation or trait, either passive or active. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'You sucked them - dealing 5 damage.'
